text: Johannes Kühn (born 19 November 1991) is a German biathlete. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==Biathlon results== All results are sourced from the International Biathlon Union. ===Olympic Games=== 2 medals (2 bronze medals) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"| !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"| |- | align=left | 2018 Pyeongchang | 58th | | | | | |} ===World Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !Event !style="text-align:center; width:70px;"|Individual !style="text- align:center; width:70px;"|Sprint !style="text-align:center; width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="text-align:center; width:70px;"|Mass Start !style="text-align:center; width:70px;"|Relay !style="text-align:center; width:70px;"|Mixed Relay !style="text-align:center; width:70px;"|Single mixed relay |- | align=left | 2019 Östersund | — | 23rd | 24th | — | — | — |— |- | align=left | 2020 Antholz | 26th | 40th | 28th | 10th | — | — | — |} :*During Olympic seasons competitions are only held for those events not included in the Olympic program. :**The single mixed relay was added as an event in 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Biathletes at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:German male biathletes Category:Olympic biathletes of Germany Category:People from Passau
title: Johannes Kühn
